member.name: P:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Core.ServiceContext.ServiceRequestLoggingLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the Desired Location for files created on file system while logging API requests and responses (if is set to true). Default Value is Temp directory. File name will be the request id + time stamp with a txt extension.
member.exception: If the specified directory is not found.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Core.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.DataAggregation.Core assembly has components required to call Aggregation and Categorization service APIs. ServiceContext class is one among those components which must be created to invoke REST Service APIs. The ServiceContext class holds context information such as authorization.
